def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    last_digit = sequence[-1]
    remaining_sequence = sequence[1:-1].replace(first_digit, '0', 1).replace(last_digit, first_digit)
    return first_digit + remaining_sequence + last_digit

the original sequence "0000000000022200000000" is transformed into "0000000000000022200000", the original sequence "0000555555555555000000" is transformed into "0000000555555555555000", the original sequence "0555555555555555000000" is transformed into "0000555555555555555000"

def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    last_digit = sequence[-1]
    remaining_sequence = sequence[1:-1].replace(first_digit, '0', 1).replace(last_digit, first_digit)
    return first_digit + remaining_sequence + last_digit
